Desc.eng: Fires a shot that goes through all targets in a straight line. Each hit releases two ice fragments that fly off to either side potentially damaging other targets, but the main projectile travels on with 25% less force. Each skill level of Icicle Shoot increases damage by 5%.

effect0.eng: The first hit does %attack_ Ice Damage (%weapondamage_ of Weapon Damage)

Desc.eng: Damage is increased by %damagebonus_.
The fragments have a %passthroughchancebonus_% chance to go through targets.
Each hit recharges %manasteal_ mana.
Damage on frozen and slowed targets is increased by 20%.
The main projectile only loses 20% on impacts.

Hurls a small electric sphere that creates a 4 meter shock explosion upon hitting a target. The sphere then remains in place for 6 more seconds and keeps shocking up to three enemies within 4 meters every 2 seconds.

effect0.eng: %attack_ Lightning Damage (%Weapon Damagedamage_ of Weapon Damage)

Desc.eng: The ball lightning remains in place for %skilldurationbonus_ more seconds.
The ball lightning arcs recharge %manasteal_ of your mana with each hit.
Targets hit are paralyzed for %durationbonus_ seconds (Applies to both the explosion and the lightning arcs).
The area of effect is increased by 1 meter (Applies to both the explosion and the lightning arcs).
The sphere remains for two more seconds.
Fires a specially enchanted round that blinks enemies backwards up to 5 meters (some enemies may resist the effect). The ability fires at half the regular attack rate.

effect0.eng: Hit (Physical):\n- Damage Effectiveness: %weapondamage_ \n- Total Damage: +%lvlscale_

Desc.eng: Damage is increased by %damagebonus_.
Blink distance is increased by %knockbackbonus_ meters.
Targets are slowed by %slow_ for %slowduration_ seconds.
Targets have a %killchance_ chance to be lost in the ink. They are unlikely to survive.
Targets are afflicted by %vulnerability_ vulnerability for %vulnerabilityduration_ seconds.

Fires a shot that damages a target on impact and covers them with acid that does 20% of the impact damage per second, for 5 seconds. The acid also splashes around thet target, creating 2 small acid puddles that remain for 3 seconds and damage enemies who step into them. Each skill level of Poisoned Shot increases damage by 5%

effect0.eng: %attack_ Poison Damage (%weapondamage_ of Weapon Damage)

Desc.eng: Damage of both the impact and the acid is increased by %damagebonus_.
Targets are poisoned for 10 seconds, taking %dot_(1) of the original impact damage each second.
Targets are afflicted by %modifiervalue_(vulnerability)% vulnerability for 3 seconds.
Mana cost is reduced by 20%.
The shot now creates one more acid puddle.
Your movement speed increases to 1.5 times your normal speed for a short time (does not affect attack speed, only movement).
Duration is increased by %durationbonus_ seconds.
Movement speed is increased by an additional %speedbonus_ times your normal speed.
You become invulnerable for %invulnerabilityduration_ seconds.
While hasted, you gain a bonus %dodge_ Dodge and %defense_ Defense.
While hasted, you also gain a bonus %damagebonus_ damage.
Several chain hooks lash out in 360 degrees around you, grab up to 10 enemies and drag them to you. The spell has a range of 15 meters.

effect0.eng: The affected creatures are stunned for 2 seconds.

Desc.eng: Targets struck have their physical resistance reduced by %physicalresist_ for 3 seconds.
Targets are stunned for +%stundurationbonus_ seconds longer.
Each hit heals you for %healperhit_ of your maximum health.
%pullcountbonus_ additional chain hooks are launched.
The affected creatures take %weapondamage_ of Weapon Damage.

Pentagram spell: Casting this spell creates a pentagram, the points of which must be clicked to release the spell effect. All enemies within the pentagram circle take continuous fire damage for 10 seconds.

effect0.eng: %attack_ Fire Damage (%weapondamage_ of Weapon Damage) / second

Desc.eng: The pentagram is 1 meter larger.
The pentagram causes +10% damage.

Pentagram spell: Casting this spell creates a pentagram, the points of which must be clicked to release the spell effect. All enemies within the pentagram circle have their attack, damage, and casting rate statistics reduced.

effect0.eng: Attack, Damage and Casting rate of enemies is reduced by -%modifiervalue_(attack) %

Desc.eng: The pentagram is 1 meter larger.
The pentagram also stuns enemies for 1 second.
You vault backwards several meters and fire an explosive projectile to where you stood. The explosion damages enemies within 3 meters.

effect0.eng: %attack_ Fire/Physical Damage (%weapondamage_ of Weapon damage)

Desc.eng: The area of effect of the explosion is 2 meters larger.
Cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds.
Summons a storm spirit that fights beside you for 30 seconds, attacking enemies with lightning strikes. The spirit's Attack, Defense ratings and Hit Points are based on your corresponding statistics.

effect0.eng: Spirit (Lightning):\n- Damage Effectiveness: %weapondamage_

effect1.eng: The spirit has %casterhp_ of your Hit Points.

Desc.eng: The spirit's damage is increased by %damagebonus_.
The spirit's health is increased by %hpbonus_.
The spirit remains %durationbonus_ seconds longer.
Duration is increased by 10 seconds.
Cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds.

Releases a 1 meter wide wave of force that travels 16 meters and shoves enemies aside and knocks them down. Powerful enemies may resist the effect and stop the wave. When the wave stops an explosion occurs that does physical damage to enemies within 2 meters.

effect0.eng: Wave (Physical):\n- Damage Effectiveness: %weapondamage_ \n- Total Damage: +%lvlscale_

Desc.eng: Travel distance increases by %shootdistancebonus_ meters.
The explosion stuns targets for %stunduration_ seconds.
Damage is increased by %damagebonus_.
The area of effect of the explosion is increased to 3 meters.
The skill now also creates a circular pulse around you that knocks enemies down within %shootblastradius_ meters.
Opens a 3 meter radius chaos rift around you for 6 seconds. Enemies caught in the rift are randomly teleported at least 15 meters away.
Teleported enemies lose 20% of their maximum health.
The radius of the rift is increased to 4 meters.

Increases resistance against all damage types. The skill can be charged for increased bonus (to a maximum of 10 seconds). While charging, arcs of lightning periodically strike enemies around you within 4 meters.

effect0.eng: Bonus %resistance_ to all resistances.

effect1.eng: Charging adds %chargeresistance_ to all resistances per second.

effect2.eng: Closest Target (Lightning):\n- Damage Effectiveness: %weapondamage_ every half second\n- Total Damage: +%lvlscale_

Desc.eng: Targets are stunned for %stunduration_ seconds.
%targetcountbonus_ additional targets are affected.
Damage is increased by %damagebonus_.
Bonus %chargeresistancebonus_ to all resistances per second.
Damage is increased by %damagebonus_.

Bestows an aura that grants total invulnerability against all forms of attack. The protection remains active indefinitely, dissipating only when you've sustained a certain number of hits (the number depends on the skill level).

effect0.eng: Neutralizes the first %strikecount_ hits you suffer

Desc.eng: The aura neutralizes two more hits.
Cooldown is reduced by 20%.
Creates an arcane energy surge around you, causing arcane and physical damage to enemies within 6 meters and knocking them down if the damage exceeds 25% of their maximum health.

effect0.eng: %attack_ Physical/Arcane damage (%Weapon Damagedamage_ of Weapon Damage)

Desc.eng: Damage is increased by 30%.
Area of effect is increased by 2 meters.

Pentagram spell: Casting this spell creates a pentagram, the points of which must be clicked to release the spell effect. You and all allies within the pentagram gain a healing effect that grants +10% Defense and heals 5% of maximum health per second, for 10 seconds. This effect does not stack but its duration is extended each time the recipient enters the area of effect.

effect0.eng: Bonus %modifiervalue_(hp_regeneration_percent)% temporary Hit Points

effect1.eng: Bonus %modifiervalue_(hp_regeneration_percent)% temporary Hit Points and bonus %modifiervalue_(defense)% Defense

Desc.eng: The pentagram is 2 meters larger.
Duration is increased by 3 seconds.

Bolts of lightning strike all enemies within 4 meters around you causing lightning damage to them. The bolts then jump from all targets to another enemy within 2 meters and then one more time. Each enemy can only be struck once.

effect0.eng: %attack_ Lightning damage (%weapondamage_ of Weapon Damage)

Desc.eng: The initial bolts strike enemies within 5 meters.
Damage is increased by 20%.

Pentagram spell: Casting this spell creates a pentagram, the points of which must be clicked to release the spell effect. The pentagram creates an area that enemies cannot enter. Enemies already inside that area are immediately pushed outside and are knocked down (powerful enemies may resist both). The spell lasts for 10 seconds.

effect0.eng: Creates an area that enemies cannot enter

Desc.eng: The pentagram is 2 meters larger.
Enemies pushed outside take 45% of Weapon Damage.

You throw a grappler device to a single target who suffers physical damage. The device then launches chains and grapples all enemies near the target and pulls them together (powerful enemies may resist this).

effect0.eng: Hit (Physical):\n- Damage Effectiveness: %weapondamage_ \n- Total Damage: +%lvlscale_

Desc.eng: Grappled creatures are slowed by %slow_ for 5 seconds.
Targets bleed for 5 seconds, taking %bleeding_ of the original strike's damage each second.
Range is increased by %pullradiusbonus_ meters.
Pulled enemies now take %pulldamage_ of the original damage.
Pulled targets are stunned for %stunduration_ seconds.
Summons four wisps who follow you around and attack enemies who come into their range. The wisps remain within 8 meters of you and disappear after 40 seconds.

effect0.eng: Wisps do damage equal to %damage_ of Weapon Damage, their HP is equal to %hitpoints_ of Weapon Damage.

Desc.eng: The wisps remain for 15 additional seconds.
The spell summons one more wisp.

You turn into a werewolf for a short time. In this form you can only use melee skills but you gain a bonus to Critical Chance and Critical Damage. You also regenerate 5% of your maximum health each second. 5 seconds after the transformation you start to lose Rage at the rate of 5 per second. When you run out of Rage you turn back to human.

effect0.eng: Bonus %modifiervalue_(critical_hit)% Critical Chance and bonus %modifiervalue_(critical_damage_mul)% Crtical Damage

Desc.eng: Your Rage lasts for 5 seconds longer before you begin to lose grasp of it.
You gain +10% damage while transformed.
Grants a damage bonus to all skills that use Elemental or Poison damage.

effect0.eng: Elemental and Poison skills gain %modifiervalue_(increase_elemental_damage)% damage bonus

Desc.eng: Enchanting items costs 5% less at the enchanter.
Reduces the Mana cost of all skills that use Elemental or Poison damage by 10%.
Grants a defense bonus.

effect0.eng: Defense is increased by %modifiervalue_(defense)%

Desc.eng: Armors provide 20% more Defense.
All of your resistances are increased by 5% of your Defense value.
All slow, stun, freeze, shock and confusion effects created by your skills last longer.

effect0.eng: Slow, stun, freeze, shock and confusion durations are increased by %castednegativeactionduration_.

Desc.eng: All slow, stun, freeze, shock and confusion effects you create have a %doubledurationchance_ chance to last twice as long.
You deal %damageagainst_ more damage to slowed, stunned, frozen, shocked or confused enemies.
The Crowd Control Resistance statistic of enemy creatures is reduced, making them more susceptible to debilitating effects (Stun, slow, instant death, etc.).

effect0.eng: %ccresreduce_ is substracted from enemy CC Resistance.

Desc.eng: Your actual Crowd Control Resistance is increased by %ccres_.
Enemy creatures also have their resistances reduced by %resistreduce_.
Increases your Weapon Damage for all Skills, but reduces your Defense.

effect0.eng: Weapon Damage is increased by %increasephysicaldamage_. \nDefense is reduced by %physicalresist_

Desc.eng: You gain another %physicaldamagebonus_ Weapon Damage when you are below 50% health.
The Defense penalty is reduced by 25%.
Increases your maximum Mana.

effect0.eng: Maximum Mana is icreased by %modifiervalue_(mana)%

Desc.eng: You gain another 50 maximum Mana.
You also gain 10 Willpower.
Reduces the elemental and poison resistances of all enemies within 15 meters.

effect0.eng: Enemy elemental and poison resistances are reduced by %modifiervalue_(elemental_resistance_reduction)%

Desc.eng: Enemy elemental and poison resistances are decreased by a further 2%.
Enemy elemental and poison resistances are decreased by another 2%.
Grants a damage bonus against powerful enemies (champions, elites and bosses).

effect0.eng: %damageagainst_ bonus damage against powerful enemies.

Desc.eng: Grants +%defenseagainst_ Defense against powerful enemies.
Powerful enemies are %uniquefindchance_ more likely to drop epic, set or legendary items.
When a hit takes you below 20% of your maximum health, this ability blinks you away from danger between 5 to 18 meters.

effect0.eng: Mana upkeep: %modifiervalue_(mana_reserve) of maximum Mana.

Desc.eng: When you blink away, you heal 20% of your maximum health.
When you blink away, an arcane eruption occurs where you stood. The eruption does damage equal to 80% of Weapon Damage (50% Physical, 50% Arcane damage).
By sacrificing a significant amount of mana, you can create a powerful barrier around yourself that increases your defensive ability. Mana upkeep: 40% of maximum Mana.

effect0.eng: Bonus %firedamagebonus_ damage reduction.

Desc.eng: Upkeep is reduced to 30% of maximum Mana.
Increases your defense by 10%.
Grants a %chance_ chance to deal extra damage equal to your added elemental damage whenever you damage an enemy.

effect0.eng: Deals 150% of your elemental enchantment damage.

Desc.eng: The strikes now deal 150% of your weapon damage as well.
Increases the total damage by 25%
Grants a bonus to your Weapon Damage and boosts your elemental resistance. Mana upkeep: 25% of maximum Mana.

effect0.eng: Bonus %lightningdamagebonus_ to All Skills' Weapon Damage.

Desc.eng: Upkeep is reduced to 15% of maximum Mana.
Elemental and Arcane damage bonuses on your weapon count as if they were 30% stronger.
Provides an aura that has a chance to deflect close range attacks.

effect0.eng: %modifiervalue_(parryaura)% chance to Deflect.

Desc.eng: When an attack is deflected, you heal 10% of your maximum health.
When an attack is deflected, there is a 10% chance that you become invulnerable for 3 seconds.
All skill effects that require Upkeep last longer.

effect0.eng: Upkeep skills last %durationbonus_ longer

Desc.eng: Upkeep skills cost %manacostdecrease_ less Mana.
Upkeep skills do %damagebonus_ more damage.
Your minions (both mechanoid and turret types) gain a bonus to their damage.

effect0.eng: Minions deal +%modifiervalue_(damage)% damage

Desc.eng: Mana cost of all mechanoid creation skills is decreased by 10%.
Your mechanoids' health is increased by 15%.
Your minions (both mechanoid and turret types) gain a bonus to their health.

effect0.eng: Minions have +%modifiervalue_(hitpoints)% health

Desc.eng: Mana cost of all minion creation skills is decreased by 10%.
Your mechanoids' health is increased by 10%.
Your mines (created by any of your mine type skills) do increased weapon damage.

effect0.eng: %modifiervalue_(skill_damage_bonus) increased weapon damage.

Desc.eng: Mana cost of all mine type skills is decreased by 10%.
Cooldown of all mine type skills is decreased by 10%.
Your mechanoids and turrets remain active longer.

effect0.eng: Mechanoids and turrets last %modifiervalue_(duration)% longer

Desc.eng: When a mechanoid or turret dies or disappears there is a 2% chance that a new one is created.
The cooldown of all skills that create a mechanoid or turret is decreased by 10%.

A fiery image of yourself dashes forward in a straigth line, burning enemies in its path and creating a swath of flames in its wake. With each enemy hit, the fire grows weaker. The image stops after traveling 10 meters, sooner if its damage drops to zero. The swath of flames continue to burn enemies for 3 more seconds afterwards.

effect0.eng: %attack_ Fire damage (%weapondamage_ of Weapon Damage)

Desc.eng: Damage is increased by %damagebonus_.
The swath burns for an additional %skilldurationbonus_ seconds.
Targets who enter the swath are ignited for 3 seconds, taking %dot_(1) of the original damage each second.
Cooldown is reduced by 1 seconds.
Each kill with this skill grants +1 Rage.
Creates a 10 meter long, 1 meter wide flame in the direction of the attack, dealing damage to enemies and leaving them burning for 50% of the original damage per second for 6 seconds.

effect0.eng: Hit (Fire):\n- Damage Effectiveness: %weapondamage_ \n- Total Damage: +%lvlscale_

Desc.eng: Damage is increased by %damagebonus_.
The width of the flame is increased by %widthbonus_ meters.
Burning damage of the flame is increased by %burning_.
Mana cost reduced by %manacostdecrease_.
Flamestrike powerups cost %powerupcostdecrease_ less Rage.
Burning damage is increased by %aoedamagebonus_.
The length of the flame is increased by %lengthbonus_ meters.

Damages a single target who is also ignited, taking damage for 5 more seconds. If another enemy steps within 2 meters of the target during this time, then they are also ignited. These secondary targets cannot ignite others.

effect0.eng: %attack_ initial Fire Damage (%weapondamage_ of Weapon Damage)

effect1.eng: %attack_(1) Fire Damage per second (%weapondamage_ of Weapon Damage)

Desc.eng: The ignition zone of the initial target is +%customrange_ meters larger.
The burning damage is increased by +%damagebonus_(1).
The initial damage is increased by +%damagebonus_.
Burning time is increased by 2 seconds.
The secondary targets now also ingite those who go near them. Tertiary targets won't spread the fire further.
A melee attack that damages a single target and creates 9 splinters that fly off in a 220Â° arc and also damage other targets. All enemies hit by the splinters get tagged with a shadow mark.

effect0.eng: Hit and Splinter (Physical):\n- Damage Effectiveness: %weapondamage_ \n- Total Damage: +%lvlscale_

Desc.eng: Damage is increased by %damagebonus_.
%shotcountbonus_ additional splinters are created.
Targets have their attack stats halved for %debuffduration_ seconds.
The splinters have a 30% chance to pass through enemies and potentially damage others.
The splinters have a 10% chance to deal double damage.
Significantly increases your Weapon Damage.

effect0.eng: Bonus %modifiervalue_(weapondamage_bonus)% Weapon Damage

Desc.eng: Cloaks provide +10% more Weapon Damage.
Amulets provide +10% more Weapon Damage.

Grabs an enemy, lifts them up into the air and deals physical damage to them. If the target was damaged for at least 50% of their maximum health, the spell allows you to to throw the target away by dragging the mouse into any direction before releasing the button. Thrown targets fly up to a maximum of 10 meters and deal damage to enemies within 3 meters of their landing point. The damage is equal to what the primary target suffered originally.

effect0.eng: %attack_ Physical damage (%weapondamage_ of Weapon Damage)

Desc.eng: The damage radius of thrown enemies is increased by +%linkedrangebonus_ meters.
Damage is increased by %damagebonus_.
Targets are stunned for %durationbonus_ seconds.
Thrown targets fly for a maximum if 15 meters.
Targets are thrown if the damaged is at least 35% of their maximum health.

The Ray of Entropy runs from the caster towards the mouse cursor while you keep the the mouse button pressed, stopping at the first solid obstacle it hits within 15 meters. Foes hit by the ray will suffer continuous damage while you continuously heal 3% of that damage.

effect0.eng: Ray (Ice, Arcane):\n- Damage Effectiveness: 600% per second\n- Total Damage: +%lvlscale_

Desc.eng: The ray affect enemies within %aoeradius_ meters of the primary target.
Damage is increased by %damagebonus_ during the first 3 seconds.
Healing is increased by %healbonus_.
The spell's range is increased to 18 meters.
You gain 30% flat damage reduction while channeling the spell.

You draw a line on the ground (by keeping the button pressed). When you release the button, a 1 meter radius orb of lightning appears at the beginning of the line and rolls forward along it. Enemies touched by the orb take lightning damage and are shocked for 2 seconds. You can draw any shape of any length as long as you have enough mana to do so. The longer the line, the more mana the spell consumes. (Base Mana cost is 10 and doubles with each additional meter.)

effect0.eng: %attack_ Lightning damage (%weapondamage_ of Weapon Damage)

Desc.eng: Damage is increased by %damagebonus_.
Enemies struck are shocked for %customtime_ seconds.
Enemies struck have a %killchance_ chance to be killed instantly. (Powerful enemies may be immune to this.)
Mana cost is reduced by 30%.
Enemies are knocked down if damage is greater than 40% of their Hit Points.
Each enemy killed grants you a cumulative +10 Willpower for a few seconds.

effect0.eng: Bonus 10 Willpower for %linkedskillduration_ seconds per kill

Desc.eng: The spell now provides +13 Willpower with each kill.
The spell also provides +2 Weapon Damage with each kill.

You draw a straight line on the ground (by keeping the button pressed). When you release the button, each enemy in a 1 meter wide strip along the line takes physical and arcane damage. If the damage exceeds 25% of a target's maximum health, they are also knocked down. The damage and the mana cost of the spell depends on the length of the line.

effect0.eng: %attack_ Physical/Arcane damage (%weapondamage_ of Weapon Damage)

Desc.eng: Damage is increased by %damagebonus_.
Enemies struck are afflicted with %modifiervalue_(vulnerability)% vulnerability for 5 seconds.
Enemies struck have their attack statistic reduced by %modifiervalue_(attack_rate)% for 5 seconds.
Mana cost is reduced by 20%.
Damage is increased by 10%.

The Ray of Frost runs from the caster towards the mouse cursor while you keep the mouse button pressed, stopping at the first solid obstacle it hits within 15 meters. Foes hit by the ray will suffer continuous damage and are slowed by 66% for 3 seconds.

effect0.eng: Ray (Ice):\n- Damage Effectiveness: 400% Per Second \n- Total Damage: +%lvlscale_

Desc.eng: Damage is increased by %damagebonus_.
Targets are frozen for %freezeduration_ seconds (applies once per burst).
Targets are afflicted by %vulnerability_ vulnerability for 5 seconds (does not stack).
The spell's range is increased to 18 meters.
Ray of Frost powerups cost 1 less Rage.
Grants damage reduction while you are at maximum Rage.

effect0.eng: %modifiervalue_(damage_reduction)% Damage Reduction

Desc.eng: Also grants +20% Defense while you are at maximum Rage.
The bonuses are applied from 90% of maximum Rage.
The spell attacks a single target, who has a chance to explode from the inside. If the target survives, they take heavy arcane damage instead.

effect0.eng: %killchance_ chance to kill the target instantly

Desc.eng: Chance of an instant kill is increased by %killchancebonus_.
Damage is increased by %damagebonus_.
If the spell's target dies, the resulting explosion damages enemies within 2 meters for %explosivedamage_ of the target's maximum health.
Mana cost is reduced by 30%.
Chance of an instant kill is increased by 5%.

A ball of molten magma explodes at the target point, doing fire damage to anyone within 3 meters radius as well as knocking them down if the damage exceeds 25% of their maximum health. The magma also ignites enemies causing further damage for 5 seconds. The spell can be charged to do more damage (by keeping the button pressed) to a maximum of 4 seconds. You cannot move while charging.

effect0.eng: %attack_ Fire Damage (%weapondamage_ of Weapon Damage)

effect1.eng: Damage is increased by %explosivedamage_ per second spent charging

Desc.eng: Damage is increased by %damagebonus_.
The spell ignites the ground which causes %dot_(1) of the original damage to enemies in the area.
Targets have their fire resistance decreased by %modifiervalue_(fire_resistance)% for 5 seconds.
Mana cost is reduced by 20%.
Each kill with this spell produces +1 Rage.
Whenever you are hit there is a chance that a bubble of invulnerability spontaneously forms around you, protecting you for several seconds.

effect0.eng: %castchance_ chance to gain chaos armor per hit.

Desc.eng: Chance is increased by 3.5%.
Duration is increased by .25 seconds.
Summons a swarm of angry souls at the target, dealing damage within 3 meters. The swarm remains for 5 seconds and causes arcane damage. If the swarm kills an enemy you heal 3% of your maximum health.

effect0.eng: Swarm (Arcane):\n- Damage Effectiveness: %weapondamage_ per second\n- Total Damage: +%lvlscale_

Desc.eng: Damage is increased by %damagebonus_.
Targets are slowed by %chill_ while in the area of effect.
Each time the spirits damage an enemy, you gain %manaperhit_ of you maximum Mana.
Area of effect is increased by 1 meter.
You heal for %hpperhit_ of your maximum Health for each enemy hit when the storm was created.
Launches a cluster of 5 icicles at the target which always hit and do the listed damage individually. If the target is frozen or slowed the damage is 25% greater.

effect0.eng: Per Bolt (Ice):\n- Damage Effectiveness: %weapondamage_ \n- Total Damage: +%lvlscale_

Desc.eng: Damage is increased by %damagebonus_.
%boltcount_ icicles are launched.
The icicles slow enemies by 50% within 2 meters around the target, for %slowduration_ seconds.
One additional icicle is launched.
Targets are slowed by 20% (both movement and attack).
Instead of a normal melee attack, you throw a knife at an enemy within 12 meters. The target receives a shadow mark.

effect0.eng: Knife (Physical):\n- Damage Effectiveness: %weapondamage_ \n- Total Damage: +%lvlscale_

Desc.eng: Damage is increased by %damagebonus_.
Targets are stunned for %stunduration_ seconds.
Targets have a %killchance_ chance to be killed instantly. (Powerful enemies may be immune to this.)
Range is increased by 3 meters.
Range is increased by 5 meters.
Spells which have Mana Upkeep reserve less mana.

effect0.eng: Mana Upkeep is reduced by %upkeepdecrease_

Desc.eng: Arcane Influence is increased by %willpower_.
Your maximum Mana is increased by %maxmana_.

All enemies within 4 meters of the target point lose a large portion of their current Hit Points. After a 3 second delay, the targets gradually regenerate the damage during a period of 5 seconds. (Unless you kill them first.)

effect0.eng: Targets temporarily lose %explosivedamage_% of their current Hit Points

Desc.eng: The damage regeneration starts %customtime_ seconds later.

Enemies struck also suffer from %modifiervalue_(vulnerability)% vulnerability.
Cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds.
Targets are also stunned for 1 second.
Provides a percentage and a fixed bonus to your resistance against physical attacks.

effect0.eng: Bonus %physicalresist_ Physical Resistance.

Desc.eng: Your maximum Hit Points are also increased by 5%.
You also gain a bonnus 10% to your Defense.
Strikes a single target and knocks them back several meters with a 10% chance. (Some enemies may be able to resist the knockback effect.)

effect0.eng: %attack_ Physical Damage (%weapondamage_ of Weapon Damage)

Desc.eng: Damage is increased by %damagebonus_.
Adds a radius of %rangebonus_ meters to all effects.
Drains health equal to %heal_ of your max Hit Points.
Each kill with Uppercut generates 1 more Rage point.
Each kill with Uppercut recharges 4% of your maximum Mana.
Whenever an enemy strikes you, there is a chance that they also take damage equal to your Weapon Damage.

effect0.eng: The effect has a %customchance_% chance to fire

Desc.eng: The damage is increased by 20%.
Whenever the effect fires there is a 20% chance that you also heal all damage you took from that strike.

You draw a line on the ground (by keeping the button pressed) thus creating a 1 meter thick wall of ice that blocks movement. Any enemies caught in the wall take ice damage and are frozen for the duration of the spell. (Powerful enemies may be able to break free sooner.) The wall consists of segments that can be attacked and destroyed by enemies.

effect0.eng: %attack_ Ice damage (%weapondamage_ of Weapon Damage).

effect1.eng: The wall segments have %hitpointsvalue_ Hit Points (%hitpoints_ of Weapon Damage).

Duration is increased by %skilldurationbonus_ seconds.
The wall has an additional %hitpointsbonus_% Hit Points.
Mana cost is reduced by 20%.
Duration is increased by 2 seconds.

You spin around in place, continuously damaging all enemies within 2 meters in 360 degrees. With each passing second, the damage you do increases by 20%, the area of effect increases by 1 meter (to a maximum of +100% and +5 meters), and the mana cost also increases per second. The damage interval is equal to your attack rate.

effect0.eng: Hit (Physical):\n- Damage Effectiveness: %weapondamage_ \n- Total Damage: +%lvlscale_

Desc.eng: Damage is increased by %damagebonus_.
The first hit stuns enemies for %durationbonus_ seconds.
Targets bleed for 5 seconds, taking %dot_ of the original Whirlwind damage each second.
Mana cost is reduced by 10%.
Each time you hit an enemy you heal %hpperhit_ of your maximum Hit Points.
Projects a crackling bolt of energy that damages enemies in a straight line.

effect0.eng: Bolt (Fire, Lightning):\n- Damage Effectiveness: %weapondamage_ \n- Total Damage: +%lvlscale_

Desc.eng: When the bolt hits an enemy, there is a %customchance_% chance that an explosion occurs, damaging enemies within 2 meters.
Enemies struck are stunned for %durationbonus_ seconds.
Targets are ignited for 3 seconds, taking %dot_ of the original bolt damage each second.
When the bolt kills an enemy, it continues to travel doing +25% damage to subsequent enemies.
The bolt becomes larger, thus doing damage in a wider path.
Creates a small mechanoid that can attack enemies with a flamethrower at close range. Your Body and Dexterity statistics increase the spider's hit points and your Weapon damage increases its damage.

effect0.eng: The minion's base damage is %damage_ of your Weapon damage (Fire damage)

Desc.eng: The spider's Hit Points are increased by %modifiervalue_(hitpoints)%.
The spider's damage is increased by %modifiervalue_(damage)%.
The spider moves %modifiervalue_(speed_nocap)% faster.
The spider remains active 5 seconds longer.
The spider's targets are ignited for 3 seconds, taking 10% of the original attack damage each second.
Increases the maximum number of minions you can have at once.

effect0.eng: Minion Limit is increased by +%modifiervalue_(minion_limit)

Desc.eng: Your minions have +10% Hit Points.
Your minions do +10% damage.

Launches three grenades in rapid succession which impact the ground in a triangle pattern. Grenades not hitting targets will bounce on until they are stopped by an obstacle or until 2,5 seconds have passed.

effect0.eng: Grenade (Physical):\n- Damage Effectiveness: %weapondamage_ \n- Total Damage: +%lvlscale_

Desc.eng: Blast radius of each grenade is increased by %linkedrangebonus_ meters
Enemies struck are ignited for 10 seconds, taking %dot_ of the original grenade damage each second.
Enemies struck have their physical resistance reduced by 50% for %durationbonus_ seconds.
Enemies are knocked down if damage is greater than 25% of their Maximum Hit Points.
After a grenade explodes, a smaller charge dealing 50% damage bounces on for a short distance.
Your minions are created with increased damage and hit points.

effect0.eng: Your minions gain +%modifiervalue_(mechanical_spider_damage) damage

Desc.eng: There is a 10% chance that any minion you create deals double damage.
When a minion dies or disappears there is a 10% chance that a new one is created.

Launches a mine to the target location, which arms itself 2 seconds after it lands. If an enemy approaches the mine it detonates, causing fire damage to everyone within 3 meters and ingniting them for 5 seconds. (Note that you can only have a maximum of 3 mines at once. Laying a 4th mine destroys the one you've created first.)

effect0.eng: %attack_ Fire damage (%weapondamage_ of Weapon damage)

effect1.eng: %attack_(1) Fire damage (%weapondamage_(1) of Weapon damage) per second

Desc.eng: Enemies struck burn for +%durationbonus_ seconds.

Damage is increased by %damagebonus_.
You can have a maximum of 4 mines at once.
Enemies are knocked down if damage is greater than 25% of their Max Hit Points.
Your turrets are created with increased damage and hit points.

effect0.eng: Your turrets gain +%modifiervalue_(mechanical_turret_damage) damage

Desc.eng: There is a 10% chance that any turret you create deals double damage.
When a turret dies or disappears there is a 10% chance that a new one is created.
Grants life steal to your attacks when you are at maximum Rage.

Creates a small mechanical spider that automatically repairs your mechanoids and turrets.

Reduces the mana upkeep by 15.
When the drone activates its repair ability you also heal 0.5% of your maximum health.

Shoots a metallic shell that damages a single target and knocks them down if the damage exceeds 25% of their maximum health. The canister then explodes, launching 8 metallic shards which deal 25% damage within 10 meters.

The shards deal +%sharddamagebonus_ additional damage.
The shards have %passthroughchance_ chance to pass through targets and keep on going.

Lays 5 frost mines around you. If an enemy approaches a mine it detonates, causing ice damage to everyone within 1.5 meters and slowing them by 30%. Laying new mines destroys any other mines you've previously created. Each skill level of the Frost Trap skill increases damage by 5%.

Enemies struck are frozen for %durationbonus_ seconds.
Enemies struck have their ice resistance reduced by %modifiervalue_(ice_resistance)% for 5 seconds.
1 additional mine is deployed.
The slow effect is increased to 50%.

Launches a frost grenade forward that bounces off the ground and explodes upon impact. If no enemies are hit, the grenade explodes after 2.5 seconds. The explosion does ice damage in 2 meters radius and slows enemies by 50%.

After the explosion, a smaller charge dealing 50% damage bounces on for a short distance.

Launches a mine to the target location, which arms itself 2 seconds after it lands. If an enemy approaches the mine it detonates, creating a small black hole that persists for 5 seconds and does combined damage (all damage types combined) to enemies within 3 meters. (Note that you can only have a maximum of 3 mines at once. Laying a 4th mine destroys the one you've created first.)

Creates a gun turret that also bestows a damage bonus to all of your minions within 4 meters. The turret's damage and Hit Points are dependant on your Body and Dexterity attributes.

Creates a force field around you that soaks up a portion of the damage from each hit and stores it as energy. When the buffer has accumulated 1000 points of damage, the force field explodes causing lightning damage to enemies within 4 meters. The damage is equal to 3 times the accumulated energy. The force field does not have a time limit. Creating a new force field while already having an active one will explode the active one with the amount of energy collected.

effect0.eng: The field absorbs %explosivedamage_ damage

effect1.eng: The field explodes at %hitpoints_ points of absorbed damage

Desc.eng: The area of effect of the explosion is 5 meters.
The explosion does damage equal to 4 times of the accumulated energy.
Creates a mechanical spider that engages enemies with saw blades. They also have a powerful energy field that recharges itself outside combat.

Mechanoid (Physical):
- Damage Effectiveness: %damage_

The health of each spider is increased by %hpbonus_.
Whenever a spider deals damage it also heals you for %healbonus_ of your maximum health.
When a spider dies there is a 20% chance that it reassembles itself immediately.
When a spider dies an explosion occurs, dealing fire damage to enemies within 4 meters. The damage is equal to the spider's maximum health.

Freezes time around you and creates a bubble of personal time where you are free to act. Attacking, moving or casting spells causes this bubble to shrink, other actions like shuffling items in your inventory are completely free. When the bubble shrinks away completely, the world returns to normal.

effect0.eng: Stops time for %skillduration_ seconds.

Desc.eng: Moving during the spell costs half the usual time.
You gain 10% increased damage for the duration of the spell.
Summons your chimera to do battle. The chimera can be summoned anywhere within 20 meters and remain by your side until the duration is over or its HP is reduced to zero.
The chimera gains +20% health in battle.
When the chimera "dies" an explosion occurs, damaging all enemies within 5 meters for 500% of its melee damage. Enemies are knocked down if the damage exceeds 50% of their maximum health.
You gain a bonus to all your resistances while you are at maximum Rage.

effect0.eng: Bonus %modifiervalue_(full_resistance)% to all Resistances

You blink forward up to 5 meters with blinding speed and strike a single target. Any shadow marks on the target cumulatively increase the damage by 25%. The shadow marks are then destroyed.

An immensely powerful spell that slows time and grabs all enemies within a 3 meters radius area, lifting them up in the air and dealing heavy arcane damage to them. The spell can be charged for a maximum of 5 seconds for continuous damage. The massive strain of using such dark magic also damages you for 10% damage. Desc.eng: Damage is increased by %damagebonus_ (50%/level).
Enemies are slowed by +%slowbonus_ (+10%/level).
The trap freezes enemies for %freezeduration_ (1/level) seconds, switching to a new target each time it does. If all available targets are frozen it keeps damaging the current one.

effect0.eng: Creates 4 meter long continuous jets of flame in four directions, which deal %trapdamage_ fire damage per second. These flames ignite enemies for 5 seconds, who take %dot_ of the original damage each second.

Desc.eng: Enemy fire resistance is reduced by %firevulnerability_ (30%/level).
Damage is increased by %trapdamagebonus_ (30%/level).
Ignited enemies take %dotbonus_ (5%/level) increased burn damage.

effect0.eng: Enemies stepping on the trap take %trapdamage_ physical damage. Cooldown: %cooldown_ seconds

Desc.eng: Trap reset time is decreased by %cooldownbonus_ (0.5/level) seconds.
Damage is increased by %damagebonus_ (50%/level).
Enemies are poisoned for %dotduration_ seconds, taking %dotbonus_ (5%/level) of the original trap damage each second.

effect0.eng: Releases a werewolf when enemies come near.

Desc.eng: Released werewolf has %creaturehealthincrease_ (50%/level) increased health.
Released werewolf has %creaturedamageincrease_ (50%/level) increased damage.
The box controls %creaturecount_ (1/level) additional werewolves.

effect0.eng: Launches a fireball at enemies that deals %trapsimpledamage_ fire damage within 4 meters of the impact point and knocks them down if the damage exceeds 25% of their maximum health. Range: 16 meters. Cooldown: %cooldown_ seconds

Desc.eng: Trap reset time is decreased by %cooldownbonus_ seconds(1 second/level).
Damage is increased by %damagebonus_ (30%/level).
Ignited enemies take %dotbonus_ (10%/level) increased burn damage.

effect0.eng: Fires continuously at a single target at a rate of one shot per %cooldown_ seconds, dealing %trapsimpledamage_ physical damage per shot. Range: 16 meters

Desc.eng: Adds %damagebonus_ (30%/level) bonus fire damage.
%aoedamage_ of the base damage is applied to enemies within %rangebonus_ (1/level) meters of the primary target.
Enemies struck are slowed by %slowbonus_ (15/level) for %slowduration_ seconds.

effect0.eng: Enemies stepping on the trap take %trapsimpledamage_ fire damage each second.

Desc.eng: Enemies are ignited for %dotduration_ seconds, taking %dotbonus_ (10%/level) of the original trap damage each second.
Damage is increased by %damagebonus_ (30%/level).
Enemies are disoriented for %disorientbonus_ (1/level) seconds, unable to attack or use abilities (but still able to move).

effect0.eng: If an enemy approaches the device an electric arc shocks each enemy within 8 meters, causing %trapsimpledamage_ Lightning damage. The arcs then jump to another enemy within 3 meters, causing 80% of the damage caused to the first target. Cooldown: %cooldown_ seconds.

Desc.eng: Damage is increased by %damagebonus_ (30%/level).
Trap reset time is decreased by %cooldownbonus_ (0.5/level).
Enemies have their attack statistic reduced by %weakenbonus_ (15%/level) for %weakenduration_ seconds.

effect0.eng: Summons a tough but slow ice golem.

Desc.eng: Summoned golem has %trapmonsterhp_% (%trapmonsterhpperlevel_%/level) increased health.
Summoned golem has %trapmonsterdamage_% (%trapmonsterdamageperlevel_%/level) increased damage.
The tower also summons %trapmonstercount_ (%trapmonstercountperlevel_/level) Frost Spirits.

effect0.eng: Throws enemies who step on the trap aside, causing %simpledamage_ Physical damage, knocking them on the ground or into a nearby chasm (powerful enemies may resist this effect). Cooldown: %cooldown_ seconds.

Desc.eng: Trap reset time is decreased by %cooldowndecrease_ seconds(%cooldowndecrease_(cooldown=1) second/level).
Damage is increased by %damagebonus_ (%damagebonus_(custom1=1)/level).
Splashes oil on enemies within 8 meters at activation, afflicting them with %firevulnerability_ (%firevulnerability_(custom2=1)/level) vulnerability against fire.

effect0.eng: Enemies caught between the metal plates take %damage_ Physical damage. Those who survive are stunned for 3 seconds. Cooldown: %cooldown_ seconds.

Desc.eng: Kills heal you for 2% of your maximum health.
Grants a 10% increase to Physical Resistance.
Targets are slowed by %chill_ for 3 seconds.
All skills using elemental damage cost 10% less Mana.
Grants a 10% increase to Defense.
Damage is increased by 30%.
Duration is increased by 1 second.
The slowing effect is increased by 20%.
25% of the damage is substracted from your Mana.
Mana cost is decreased by 30%.
The copy gains a bonus 20% to all its resistances and its defense.
Mana cost is reduced by 10%.
Duration is increased by 5 seconds.
Targets have 20% chance to be stunned for 2 seconds.
Your Defense is reduced for 5 seconds.
Your Defense and all Resistances are reduced for 10 seconds.
You are unable to heal for 10 seconds.
You are immobilized.
Your location is are about to be struck by lightning! Move!
You are statically charged for 5 seconds. You will take lightning damage from nearby monsters each second.
You are under a harmful spell that damages you each second for 4 seconds.
You are immobilized by a net and your Defense is reduced to 0.
You are immobilized by vines and taking continuous damage.
You are frozen and unable to act.
You are being marked. You take +30% damage from all sources.
You are slowed down while you are in the affected area.
You are slowed down and lose your Mana continously.
You are slowed down by 40%.
You are slowed down by 40%.
Calls down a devastating artillery barrage to the selected location.
Calls down a devastating artillery barrage to the selected location.
Calls in a group of Resistance soldiers via rift-shell to aid you.
You are Stunned and unable to act.
You need to finish the Adventure without dying too many times.

effect0.eng: You have %skillduration_ lives left. If you die more than that, you fail the Adventure.

Desc.eng: You are bleeding and will continue to suffer Physical Damage.
You are bleeding and will continue to suffer Physical Damage.
You are slowed down by 30%.
Your are being followed by curse spirits that decrease your Defense and Resistances by 15%.
You are being marked. You take +30% damage from all sources. You also take continuous fire damage from the beam.
You have been poisoned. You are taking continuous poison damage.
You are slowed down by 30%.
An energy barrier deflects almost all damage. You must disable it to be able to fight this opponent effectively.
An energy barrier makes the general invulnerable. However, it draws its power from the general's soldiers, so the more soldiers you eliminate the weaker it gets.
The Queen calls down several falling rocks that deal damage within 2 meters of their impact point. Prior to impact, indicators mark these points for a few seconds.
The Queen strikes the ground with all her branches, damaging and knocking back her enemies all around her.
The Queen grabs all her enemies within 18 meters with roots that burst up from the ground. The roots constrict their victims, keeping them immobile for a short time and causing physical damage.
The Queen launches a continuous barrage of thorns that deal physical damage to those they hit.
The Queen creates a powerful gust of wind that launch rocks, branches and debris at her enemies, doing physical damage.
You are slowed down by 40% for 3 seconds.
You have been grappled by ghostly chains. You are slowed down for 10 seconds (the further you go from the enemy the greater the slow effect).
You are slowed down by 30%.
You are slowed down while you are in the Frozen area.
Attack Rate increased by 60%
All cooldowns reduced by 40%
Critical Hit chance increased by 20%
Critical Damage increased by 130%
All damage increased by 50%
Movement Speed increased by 50%
Health Regeneration increased by 200%
Invulnerabiliyt for 10 seconds
Magic Item Find increased by 200%
Mana Regeneration increased by 100%
You receive benefits from the number of conditions selected.
You will loose HP continuously due a nasty plague. No more tomb raiding for a while.
Rage generation is reduced by 75%, because you are so cool.
You have 15% miss chance for your attacks, incuding area of effect type skills. It was a pretty wild party.
You can't use potions in the Adventure.
You receive benefits based on the current state of the Victory bar: Keep up the good work!
+10% damage reduce for 2 seconds each time you cast a spell.
You have been poisoned. You are taking continuous poison damage.

desc.eng: Essences reduce your Chimera's hunger by 50% more
$SIGN$$VALUE$ bonus to the chance of Instant Kill effects
$SIGN$$VALUE$ bonus to the Alchemy Capacity of Runecrafted items
The Chimera is $VALUE$ less likely to get hurt while hunting
